snippet.title: Second Rate Superheroes - Roguelike Trailer (Full Release on August 26th)
snippet.description:
Second Rate Superheroes is, I know, I know, another action roguelike "survivors-like," except it adds an additional element of defending your Mayor as well as yourself, making it more like - uh, a "survivorsurvivorslike," with roughly a 17.7% Tower Defense element on top of its already heaping dose of "paranoid scramble to survive" gameplay.

Recruit 20 former-superhero rejects / bums who never made it into the big leagues, to defend what's left of Hammercock City and its semi-corrupt Mayor McTrinkle, since the first-rate Freedom Team superheroes, the most famous and gifted of them all, were all killed, eaten, or went AWOL. With over 400 "cards," 16 Core Weapons, 11 Rare Weapons, 4 Super Weapons and 4 Side Weapons, along with 4 stages in 3 different difficulties, you can make the game as anxiety inducing as you want, as if life wasn't hard enough.

Coming to Steam on August 28th. Game is now in early access. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3094740/Second_Rate_Superheroes/

Hit me up on Twitter.
